articles.title: A three-room flat in Punggol fetched a record-high of $638,000
articles.summary:
📰 싱가포르, 주택 관련 뉴스
📢 A three-room flat in Punggol fetched a record-high of $638,000
articles.content: A three-room flat in Punggol was just sold for a record-high of $638,000. (Photo: Samuel Isaac Chua/EdgeProp Singapore). A three-room HDB flat at 406C Northshore Drive was recently sold for $638,000 ($885 psf). The 721-sq ft flat is located on the 19th to 21st storey. Northshore Residences I comprises five residential blocks and features a total of 588 flats. Northshore Residences II is a larger project, comprising seven residential blocks with 814 flats. Both projects offer a mix of two-room to five-room flats. Source: EdgeProp LandLens (as at 18 July 2025). As the owner has just fulfilled their minimum...

articles.content: A heated argument between a Hougang resident and town council staff led to police intervention. "The corridor space is more than two metres wide, and my neighbours have never complained. So why am I being asked to remove these items?" he said

articles.content: This comes after listings surfaced online offering "official" tickets for as much as $25 each. The seller claimed she had successfully secured four tickets through a Safra ballot earlier this month

📰 싱가포르 관련 뉴스
📢 Singaporean asks if there’s a loneliness epidemic going on
articles.content: SINGAPORE: “Do you feel lonely in Singapore too?” a local Reddit user asked in a post on Monday morning (Jul 21). They wrote about feeling “surrounded yet unseen” despite living in a crowded city, calling loneliness a “quiet epidemic” that is no longer found only among those who are alone but also strikes even those […]
